attributes.action: Remove the glass elevator from Norwich castle meadow
attributes.additional_details: Because despite plenty of criticism and public outrage the local council have not listened to the population of our fine city.
attributes.background: We are asking for the visually unappealing glass elevator leading to the castle museum in Norwich to be removed or changed in some way as to make it more pleasing to the eye. It is if common opinion that it does not suit the architecture of the area and upsets many.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Norwich Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact your MP and encourage them to raise the matter with the Council on your behalf, if you wished. You can find their contact details by entering your post code here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP.
